summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Connections feature with 3 sub-tabs (Influencers, Graph, Radar). All navigation, visualization, and interaction features working correctly.
passed_tests: Sidebar Connections dropdown with 3 sub-tabs (Influencers, Graph, Radar)
Navigation tabs present on all 3 pages with correct active states
Influencers page (/connections) loads with accounts table
Graph page (/connections/graph) loads with ForceGraphCore visualization
Graph page displays 30 nodes and 435 edges (exceeds 400+ requirement)
Filter Panel opens/closes with Nodes, Edges, View sections
Ranking Sidebar with Influence/Signal sorting functionality
Node Details Panel opens from ranking clicks, shows influence score, connected nodes, Why Connected
Radar page (/connections/radar) loads with scatter plot visualization
Radar page view toggle between Radar/Table works correctly
Radar page filter bar with Profile and Signal filters functional
Radar page compare mode functionality works
Navigation flow works correctly between all 3 pages via sidebar and tabs
All pages load correctly with proper visualizations (table, graph canvas, scatter plot SVG)
